name: Nitro Lane: Traffic Jam Racer
description:
Traffic jam won’t stop you! Jump behind steering-wheel of a car and rush along endless asphalt highway road in the epic race for glory! Be the fastest driver ever!

Race against time!
Take a ride! Racing game for boys and girls! Escape heavy traffic in this exploration lite arcade game! Ride through many different square landscapes! Race on asphalt in a blocky cube city! Watch for other road users - cars and motorcycles! Swipe to the sides to prevent a crash! Asphalt highway nor city lanes aren’t a safe place! Don’t drag along in heavy traffic jam! Push the accelerator pedal to the limit, rush past any other car or moto racer! Drift between them! High speed, nitro and endless asphalt dirt road is all you need! It’s the best arcade racing game in the world for free! For boys and girls! Cube blocky sandbox family racing game! Xtreme rush fun!

Endless road to explore
Explore the sandbox world of jammed city lanes! Roads in this exploration lite game run through many different blocky cube landscapes! Police won’t chase you! Speed up without limit - square & free! It’s a race time - not an easy ride! Collect powerups to drive even faster! Push nitro! Gain points on highest speed, try not to crash! Drift away! Don’t drag it out! Escape traffic jam, lite and heavy, cars and motorcycles! Go to garage and unlock cool new blocky cube cars - drive a pickup or pro road racing vehicle! Keep on asphalt - it’s not a dirt offroad nor moto gp! High speed is illegal, but police won’t catch you! You’re the square boss racer! Rush past any other racer in this exploration lite free arcade game! Feel as free as xtreme racing driver!

No traffic lights!
Wheels of your car gonna be hot! Drive fast and make others furious! You’re going to be fastest cube road racer ever! Beat friends and family, boys and girls, and climb on the highest spot in the ranking! Addictive sandbox gameplay, endless square highway road and dirt city lanes! Craft your own epic style of driving in this exploration lite arcade game! It’s best you can get on asphalt heavy traffic jammed roads! Exploration lite blocky racing game for free! Play on xtreme speed! Lite traffic on asphalt highway full of cars and motorcycles! Nobody can catch you - even police! Arcade game for boys and girls! Rush into the road!

CORE FEATURES:
Choose from many cars!
Racing in lite & heavy traffic!
Use nitro to gain higher speed!
Observe beautiful, cube, 8bit landscapes!
Rank among the fastest drivers ever!

UPCOMING FEATURES:
Multiplayer!
Co-op mode!
Story mode!
More cars to choose from!
More customization options!
More challenges on the road!
developers: PLAY COOL ZOMBIE SPORT GAMES SP Z O O
